job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Hello,</p><p><br></p><p>Hope you are doing well.</p><p><br></p><p>We have urgent<strong> Machine Learning Engineer, it is a 100% remote role.</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Machine Learning Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>100% remote</strong></p><p><br></p><p>I am seeking a&nbsp;Machine Learning Engineer who designs and develops the platform and frameworks that facilitate automated data-driven decision-making, gathers data, and determines statistical algorithms and models that a system can use to learn from experience, predict outcomes and make decisions. This is a Senior level role that requires experience working on ML projects and experience with Azure as a data platform.</p><p><br></p><p>Hands on experience with&nbsp;<strong>Azure Machine Learning Studio, Automated ML, Designer, MLOps</strong>, Responsible ML is a big plus.</p>
